title: Nidalee is bugged.
body: In my last game the enemy nidalee was porting around...it was almost as if I was lagging but the other enemy champions were moving just fine as were my team and I. The wukong noticed the same thing, and I'm fairly certain he reported her for it. I don't know if it's a hack or bug, but she didn't seem to be hacking as the ports weren't really across map. It was more of like a flash's distance away from where she was originally standing on the screen. (without a flash animation sound or being in cougar form and pouncing)

replies.body: Honestly I've seen the same thing before on nidalee, I was chasing her and then all of a sudden she was porting around as if I was disconnected. Like she would stand still for a second and then appear a few feet away. Was pretty gay.
That's exactly what I was experiencing, and the kong as well.
same thing happened in a game last night

{{champion:98}} I'm not sure about any other champs such as Leblanc or Ryze but this is actually the 2nd time Ive seen this non flash/teleport "bug" with nidalee. To explain what I saw is, I was watching an allied champ fight her and then die, as the fog of war kicks in Nidalee gains something like sorakas passive (+70 movement speed boost) no abilities cast not running through any brush just randomly. Aside from that there were 2 allied champs that tried to gank her top lane and as Im watching the minimap, she appears and disappears (fog of war) then reappears next to red buff running down towards blue as if she anticipated the gank and teleported away. Actually, I noticed this in the Ryze match I just had. I swear she was behind the enemy Sion. Then she was suddenly in front of me and killed me. Like what. Everyone else saw it, too. I was like "You all saw that?? O.o" and they did. I'm sorry I didn't have my replay on =/ I use to have it on often. It might be something to do with her pounce? Maybe it's related to the cone ability bug, or the quick fix to it might've caused something else? I'm not sure how to reproduce it. It was a 46 minute match and I only saw it happen once. I thought it could've been lag at first but everything else was moving fine and others also saw that giant hop across screen. You're in luck. My friend has this on replay. I just checked with him. I'll either have it ready for you to upload onto here, or upload it to Youtube and send you link. Either tonight or in the morning. So somewhere in the next 12 hours if you or someone else will still be on.

Logged in just to say I play on an ethernet connection and this Nid thing happened to me the other day too. I never lag when I use it.

I had the same problem, but against a LeBlanc.

I didn't pay it much mind at first because I had disconnected just previously so I thought it might have been me, but both my ping and FPS were normal.
(Ping: ~30-40; FPS: 60)

To clarify, LeBlanc, instead of walking, just began phasing about the midlane unregularly. She'd just stop moving and reappear a few feet away from where she had currently been standing, then stopped again and appeared somewhere else.

To clarify, I was moving just fine, right-clicking and walking to a spot. I didn't ask any of my teammates if they were seeing the same thing, nor do I recall if this carried out through the entire game.

Anyway, might have been just me or something is off with the walking action in some games...
Well I have baron replay and could probably find it, but replays like that always have artifacts in and of themselves so i'm not sure how useful that would be.
